page.title: 20GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {HIGHER AND HIGHER HELEN WRIGHT I LIKE TO PLAY HIGHER AND HIGHER.YOU GET A SKIPPING ROPE,ONE PERSON HOLDS AN END AND ANOTHER PERSON HOLDS THE OTHER END.TWO PEOPLE JUMP OVER THE ROPE WHICH IS RAISED A LITTLE HIGHER EACH CLEAR JUMP. IF YOU TRIP OVER THE ROPE, OR YOU KNOCK IT OUT OF THE HOLDERS HAND YOU HAVE TO HOLD THE END INSTEAD. THE WINNER IS THE PERSON WHO CAN JUMP THE HIGHEST. { {LEAP-FROG NICOLA EUSTACE I LIKE PLAYING LEAP-FROG.THIS IS HOW WE PLAY,SOMEBODY GETS ON THEIR HANDS AND KNEES,THEN WE RUN AND JUMP OVER. EACH TIME WE JUMP THE OTHER PERSON GETS HIGHER AND HIGHER AND IF SOMEONE CANNOT GET OVER THEY HAVE TO BE THE ONE WHO GETS ON THEIR HANDS AND KNEES. ITS GOOD FUN. { {
